brand_identity.name: Tactical Finance
brand_identity.visual_style: High-contrast dark mode with neon accents for data visibility in low-light environments (kitchens/back-offices).

typography.rules: Use tabular figures (monospaced numbers) for all financial data. Never use Inter for headings.

buttons.secondary: h-12 px-6 rounded-full bg-zinc-800 border border-zinc-700 active:bg-zinc-700 flex items-center justify-center
buttons.destructive: h-12 px-6 rounded-full bg-rose-500/10 border border-rose-500/50 text-rose-500 active:bg-rose-500/20 flex items-center justify-center
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-400 hover:text-white flex items-center justify-center

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-to-background ratio is at least 4.5:1. Use lighter grays (zinc-400) for muted text, never dark gray on black.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 48x48px for all interactive elements on mobile.
accessibility.text_scaling: Support dynamic type sizes. Do not hardcode fixed heights for text containers.

universal_guidelines: Design for dark mode first - deep zinc backgrounds, not pure black.
Use NativeWind (Tailwind) classes for all styling. Install it if missing.
Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use them only for accents/buttons.
Data density: High for Owners (Bento Grid), Low for Staff (Single Focus).
All financial data must be monospaced (JetBrains Mono).
Do not use `div` or `span` - use `View` and `Text` (React Native primitives).

implementation_notes.styling_strategy: Utility-first with NativeWind. Create a 'components/ui' folder for reusable primitives.
